body:
Hello.

The Other day I was talking with some Moderators, and I asked them: Why isn't there a European Senior Mod? I mean, In my opinion, there should be:
1 European one
1 U.S one
1 AU one

Opinions? :O
body_tagged:
Hello.

The Other day I was talking with some Moderators, and I asked them: Why isn't there a European Senior Mod? I mean, In my opinion, there should be:

title: Why isn't this a thing?

replies.body:
Oh, whoops, didn't see he word "senior" in there. xd 


The staff team doesn't specifically look for people timezone wise, although at can be good, it rarely ever has an affect on your chances of getting staff. It's just bad luck I guess, that there aren't any euro seniors.

replies.body:
Wow Tiger that suggestion xD

It's very kind of you that you want to start a petition, but as I said it depends on the senior staff.
And to be honest I still have to learn how to moderate as efficiently as the current seniors and develop some leadership skills.

Well, back on topic: As mentioned above, Iron is the European senior mod you trust :D If you have any issues or suggestion for the Teamspeak server, make sure to go to him. He is one of the few people that know the TS in and out!
replies.body_tagged:
Wow Tiger that suggestion xD

It's very kind of you that you want to start a petition, but as I said it depends on the senior staff.
And to be honest I still have to learn how to moderate as efficiently as the current seniors and develop some leadership skills.

Well, back on topic: As mentioned above, Iron is the European senior mod you trust :D If you have any issues or suggestion for the Teamspeak server, make sure to go to him. He is one of the few people that know the TS in and out!
